subItems.name: MOTION AMPLIFICATION
subItems.title: RDI Motion Amplification Service
subItems.description: At IMEC, we are committed to providing cutting-edge solutions for industrial maintenance and reliability. Our RDI Motion Amplification Service is a revolutionary technology that amplifies tiny movements to help you identify and diagnose machinery issues with unprecedented clarity and accuracy.

subCats.name: IRIS M
subCats.title: Iris M: Revolutionizing Motion Detection with Advanced RDI Technology
subCats.description: The Iris M platform, developed by RDI Technologies, uncovers movements invisible to the naked eye through its cutting-edge motion amplification software. This revolutionary technology converts subtle vibrations into visible motion, enhancing operational efficiency, reliability, and quality monitoring. By transforming every pixel of the camera into a sensor, Iris M delivers millions of measurements per second without any physical connection, providing real-time insights for improved decision-making.
subCats.paragraph_1: Iris M offers the groundbreaking capability to visualize even the most subtle movements in real-time using Live Motion Amplification® technology. This feature enables users to monitor and analyze vibrations across various regions simultaneously, making it possible to identify issues with unparalleled precision. The platform also supports advanced data export options and frequency filtering, ensuring comprehensive analysis and stabilization for accurate results. With Iris M, both technical and non-technical personnel can communicate more effectively, leading to faster and more informed decisions, ultimately saving time and money.

subCats.name: IRIS MX
subCats.title: Iris MX: Expanding Motion Amplification® to High-Speed Applications
subCats.description: RDI Technologies introduces Iris MX, an extension of the revolutionary Iris M™ platform, bringing Motion Amplification® to high-speed applications. Capable of capturing up to 1400 FPS in HD resolution and utilizing frame rates over 10,000 FPS, Iris MX visualizes movements exceeding 5,000 Hz, allowing users to diagnose machines quickly and thoroughly. This advanced technology provides unparalleled insights by converting complex vibrations into easy-to-understand videos, bridging communication gaps between technical and non-technical personnel.
subCats.paragraph_1: Iris MX sets a new standard in high-speed motion visualization by enabling Motion Amplification® at extraordinary frame rates. This allows users to see every subtle movement within a scene and produce infinite absolute measurements, all in real-time. The ability to visualize the entire machine, structure, and surroundings helps in identifying root causes quickly. Iris MX simplifies complex diagnostics into clear, actionable video content, empowering teams to make informed decisions and resolve issues efficiently.

subCats.name: RDI IRIS M™ TRAVELER
subCats.title: Iris M™ Traveler: Portable Vibration Analysis with Motion Amplification®
subCats.description: Experience the power of Motion Amplification® on the go with the Iris M™ Traveler. This portable, compact, and lightweight vibration analysis system is designed to move with you, capturing millions of data points quickly in challenging environments. With minimal setup time, you can easily gather critical data in tight spaces and logistically difficult areas, enhancing the capacity and reach of your reliability program.
subCats.paragraph_1: The Iris M™ Traveler uses Motion Amplification® to make invisible displacements visible, turning every pixel into a sensor capable of detecting minute movements. This system not only visualizes but also quantifies mechanical or structural behaviors with the precision of a contact displacement sensor, ensuring you can capture critical data with accuracy and ease.
subCats.paragraph_2: With its ability to filter data and visualize motion at specific frequencies, the Iris M™ Traveler helps you quickly identify and diagnose the root causes of mechanical issues. The clear, amplified videos produced by the system bridge the communication gap between technical and non-technical team members, making problem-solving more efficient and collaborative.

subCats.name: Iris CM
subCats.title: Iris CM: Continuous Equipment Monitoring with Motion Amplification®
subCats.description: Iris CM is the most innovative technology designed for monitoring the condition of your equipment or machinery. With Iris CM, Motion Amplification® becomes a flexible and scalable solution that continuously monitors your equipment even when you're away. This tool ensures you don’t miss anything in your facility by combining traditional vibration inputs with RDI's patented video-based vibration measurements.
subCats.paragraph_1: Iris CM allows for real-time, continuous monitoring of your equipment, connecting to a network of cameras to capture synchronized data from multiple views of a process, test, or machine part. With its ability to interface with accelerometers, tachometers, and any 4-20 mA inputs, Iris CM records and stores HD data from each connected camera, alongside external sensor data. Users can trigger video and data recordings based on external inputs, virtual camera-based points of interest, and motion thresholds, enabling precise quantification of vibration, amplitude, phase, and frequency for any visible event in both live Motion Amplification® and recorded footage.

subItems.name: THERMAL CAMERA
subItems.title: Advanced Thermal Imaging Camera: Precision and Performance
subItems.description: Our advanced thermal imaging camera combines cutting-edge technology with high-resolution imaging to deliver precise and reliable thermal measurements. Designed for optimal performance in demanding environments, it features an intuitive interface, automatic focusing, and versatile lens options, ensuring superior clarity and flexibility for a range of applications.

Packaging: Includes lens, 2 batteries, battery charger, hard carrying case, neck strap, front lens cap, power sources, SD card (8 GB), camera straps (hand, wrist, cord), carabiner clip, front cover, cables (USB 2.0 A – USB Type-C, USB Type-C – HDMI, USB Type-C – USB Type-C), strap brackets, screws, Torx T10 wrench, printed documentation.
Image File Format: Standard JPEG with measurement data. Infrared-only mode.
Image Storage Mode: Infrared, Visual, MSX®, Picture-in-Picture, Gallery.

subCats.name: FLIR E76 - Professional
subCats.title: Versatile Thermal Imaging for Comprehensive Inspections
subCats.description: The FLIR E76 offers versatile thermal imaging capabilities with a range of interchangeable AutoCal™ lenses, covering everything from wide-angle roof inspections to safe electrical surveys from a distance. A step up from the FLIR E54, the E76 includes an optional temperature range of up to 1000°C (1832°F), laser-assisted autofocus, and three area measurement boxes. The 320 × 240 thermal resolution delivers clear, vivid images that can be enhanced with FLIR’s patented MSX® technology for additional detail and perspective. The built-in FLIR Inspection Route feature aids inspectors in organizing large or multi-location inspections with pre-planned survey routes. For a limited time, purchasing the FLIR E76 includes a 3-month subscription to FLIR Thermal Studio Pro and FLIR Route Creator.
paragraph_1: Flexible Inspections: Telephoto, standard, and wide-angle AutoCal™ lenses help users quickly survey large targets, check machines for signs of failure, or safely inspect electrical systems.
Instant Contrast Improvement: Use FLIR’s 1-Touch Level/Span to instantly improve image contrast and highlight potential electrical or mechanical issues.
paragraph_2: Integrated Software: Built-in integration with FLIR’s routing software* includes a microphone for voice annotations and comprehensive reporting features to streamline your workflow.
Image File Format: Standard JPEG with measurement data. Infrared-only mode.
Image Storage Mode: Infrared, Visual, MSX®, Picture-in-Picture, Gallery.
paragraph_3: Packaging: Includes infrared camera with lens, 2 batteries, battery charger, hard carrying case, neck strap, front lens cap, power sources, SD card (8 GB), camera straps (hand, wrist, cord), carabiner clip, front protection, cables (USB 2.0 A – USB Type-C, USB Type-C – HDMI, USB Type-C – USB Type-C), strap brackets, screws, Torx T10 wrench, printed documents.

subCats.name: FLIR E54 - Professional
subCats.title: FLIR E54: Entry-Level Excellence for Essential Inspections
subCats.description: The FLIR E54 is the entry model in the Exx Series, delivering the resolution and sensitivity you need for basic condition monitoring, electrical/mechanical inspections, and building diagnostics. The 320 × 240 pixel thermal detector accurately measures temperatures up to 650°C (1202°F), producing clear, vivid images enhanced with FLIR’s patented MSX® technology for additional detail and perspective. The built-in FLIR Inspection Route feature helps inspectors stay organized by following pre-planned survey routes, even when inspecting large or multiple locations. For a limited time, purchasing the FLIR E54 includes a 3-month subscription to FLIR Thermal Studio Pro and FLIR Route Creator.
paragraph_1: Instant Contrast Enhancement: Use FLIR’s 1-Touch Level/Span to instantly improve image contrast and highlight potential electrical or mechanical issues.
Accurate Measurements: The E54 measures temperatures up to 650°C (1202°F), offers 3 spot meters, and displays maximum/minimum temperatures in a live area on the screen.
paragraph_2: Integrated Software: Built-in integration with FLIR’s routing software* includes a microphone for voice annotations and comprehensive reporting features to streamline your workflow.
Image File Format: Standard JPEG with measurement data. Infrared-only mode.
Image Storage Mode: Infrared, Visual, MSX®, Picture-in-Picture, Gallery.
paragraph_3: Packaging: Includes infrared camera with lens, 2 batteries, battery charger, hard carrying case, neck strap, front lens cap, power sources, SD card (8 GB), camera straps (hand, wrist, cord), carabiner clip, front protection, cables (USB 2.0 A – USB Type-C, USB Type-C – HDMI, USB Type-C – USB Type-C), strap brackets, screws, Torx T10 wrench, printed documents.

subCats.name: FLIR E8 XT - Semi-Professional
subCats.title: FLIR E8-XT: High-Resolution Thermal Imaging for Accurate Diagnostics
subCats.description: The FLIR E8-XT is an excellent device for diagnosing electrical, mechanical, and insulation issues, equipped with a 320 x 240 pixel infrared detector and a temperature range of -20°C to 550°C. FLIR's MSX® image enhancement technology delivers exceptional thermal imaging detail, while the built-in Wi-Fi allows users to quickly connect with the FLIR Tools® Mobile app for easy image sharing and report submission from anywhere.
subCats.head_1: MSX®: A New Dimension in Thermal Imaging
paragraph_1: Enhanced Image Details: The innovative and patented MSX mode overlays sharp details (text, labels, numbers, patterns, etc.) from the digital image onto the thermal image, providing unique visuals. This imaging mode, exclusive to FLIR and developed specifically for predictive maintenance, is available across all EX series models.
Tailored to Your Needs: With its 76,800-pixel E8 XT 320×240 detector, the FLIR E8-XT offers a resolution that fits your target size, working distance, application details, and budget.
paragraph_2: FLIR Tools: Completely free and available in Turkish, FLIR Tools software can be downloaded for all Ex-Series models. This software allows for easy analysis of every point on the thermal image and the creation of professional reports.
Versatile Storage Options: The FLIR E8-XT supports mixed storage for MSX, thermal, picture-in-picture, and visible mode images.

Comprehensive Measurement Features: Center spot, maximum/minimum temperature information with on-screen display, and isotherm functions for measuring above/below a set value make field measurements easier.

Convenience and Accuracy: Rechargeable battery, fast download, file sharing via USB and Wi-Fi, fast reporting, high measurement accuracy with 0.06°C sensitivity on the E8 model, and adjustable emissivity and reflected temperature parameters for reliable results. The E8-XT also features a 640x480 pixel visible light camera.
paragraph_3: Extended Warranty: FLIR offers a 2-year warranty for the camera and a 10-year warranty for the detector when products are registered online. Without registration, the warranty period is 1 year.

Packaging: The package includes the infrared camera with lens, 2 batteries, battery charger, hard carrying case, neck strap, front lens cap, power sources, SD card (8 GB), camera straps (hand, wrist, cord), carabiner clip, front protection, cables (USB 2.0 A – USB Type-C, USB Type-C – HDMI, USB Type-C – USB Type-C), strap brackets, screws, Torx T10 wrench, printed documents.

subCats.name: FLIR E6 XT - Semi-Professional
subCats.title: FLIR E6-XT: Versatile Thermal Imaging for Accurate Diagnostics
subCats.description: The FLIR E6-XT is a reliable tool for diagnosing electrical, mechanical, and building issues, featuring a 240 × 180 pixel infrared detector and a temperature range of -20°C to 550°C. Equipped with FLIR’s patented MSX® image enhancement technology, it delivers outstanding thermal imaging detail. The built-in Wi-Fi allows users to easily connect to the FLIR Tools® Mobile app for fast image sharing and report submission from any location.
subCats.head_1: MSX®: A New Dimension in Thermal Imaging
paragraph_1: Enhanced Image Details: The innovative and patented MSX mode overlays sharp details such as text, labels, numbers, and patterns from the digital image onto the thermal image, providing clear and unique visuals. This mode, designed specifically for predictive maintenance, is available in all EX series models.

Tailored to Your Needs: With its 43,200-pixel E6-XT 240×180 detector, the FLIR E6-XT offers a resolution that suits the target size, working distance, and details required for your application and budget.
paragraph_2: FLIR Tools: The FLIR Tools software, fully available in Turkish and free to download for all Ex-Series models, allows for easy analysis of every point on the thermal image and the creation of professional reports.
Versatile Storage Options: The FLIR E6-XT supports mixed storage for MSX, thermal, picture-in-picture, and visible mode images.

Comprehensive Measurement Features: The FLIR E6-XT features center spot, maximum/minimum temperature information with on-screen display, and isotherm functions for measuring above/below a set value, making field measurements easier.

Convenience and Accuracy: Includes a rechargeable battery, fast download, file sharing via USB and Wi-Fi, fast reporting, high measurement accuracy, adjustable emissivity and reflected temperature parameters for reliable results, and a 640x480 pixel visible light camera.
paragraph_3: Extended Warranty: FLIR offers a 2-year warranty for the camera and a 10-year warranty for the detector when products are registered online. Without registration, the warranty period is 1 year.

Packaging: The package includes the infrared camera with lens, 2 batteries, battery charger, hard carrying case, neck strap, front lens cap, power sources, SD card (8 GB), camera straps (hand, wrist, cord), carabiner clip, front protection, cables (USB 2.0 A – USB Type-C, USB Type-C – HDMI, USB Type-C – USB Type-C), strap brackets, screws, Torx T10 wrench, printed documents.

subCats.name: FLIR E5 XT - Semi-Professional
subCats.title: FLIR E5-XT: Versatile Thermal Imaging for Accurate Diagnostics
subCats.description: The FLIR E5-XT is a versatile thermal imaging camera equipped with a 160 × 120 pixel infrared detector and a temperature range of -20 °C to 400 °C, making it ideal for diagnosing electrical, mechanical, and building issues. It features FLIR's patented MSX® image enhancement technology, which adds sharp details from digital images to thermal images, providing exceptional clarity. Built-in Wi-Fi allows users to quickly share images and generate reports from anywhere using the FLIR Tools® Mobile app.
subCats.head_1: MSX®: The New Dimension in Thermal Imaging
paragraph_1: The innovative MSX mode overlays sharp details like text, labels, numbers, and patterns from the visual image onto the thermal image, enhancing clarity. This unique imaging mode, developed by FLIR, is available across the entire EX series and is particularly useful for predictive maintenance units.
The E5-XT, with its 19,200-pixel 160×120 detector, offers a resolution tailored to your target size, working distance, and budget, making it a cost-effective choice.
paragraph_2: FLIR Tools software, fully available in Turkish, can be downloaded for free for all Ex-Series models. This software allows for easy analysis of every point on the thermal image and the creation of professional reports.
It supports hybrid memory recording for MSX, thermal, picture-in-picture, and visible mode photographs.

With center spot, max/min temperature information, and on-screen location of these points, field measurements are made easier. Isotherm functions for above/below specific set values are also included.
paragraph_3: Rechargeable battery
Fast download
File sharing via USB and Wi-Fi
Fast reporting
Measurement accuracy (0.06 °C sensitivity in the E8 model)
Adjustable emissivity and reflected temperature parameters for reliable results
640x480 pixel visible light camera

FLIR offers a 2-year warranty on the camera and a 10-year warranty on the detector if the purchased products are registered on their website. If not registered, the warranty period is 1 year. To register your product, please visit the link provided on their website.

subCats.name: FLIR E4 - Semi-Professional
subCats.title: FLIR E4: Entry-Level Thermal Imaging Excellence
subCats.description: The FLIR E4 thermal imaging camera offers a cost-effective solution for detecting electrical, mechanical, and building issues. With a 4,800-pixel infrared resolution and FLIR's advanced MSX® technology, it ensures detailed thermal imaging and accurate temperature readings. Ideal for professionals seeking an accessible tool for reliable diagnostics and reporting.
paragraph_1: The patented MSX® technology overlays digital image details onto thermal images, enhancing visibility of text, labels, and patterns. This feature ensures clear, detailed thermal images for more precise diagnostics.
paragraph_2: The E4 comes with the FLIR Tools software, available in Turkish, which allows for comprehensive analysis and professional report creation. The software supports seamless data integration and efficient reporting, enhancing the overall diagnostic workflow.
Fast Download & Sharing: Quick file transfer via USB and Wi-Fi for efficient data handling.
Flexible Measurement Functions: Features like center spot temperature and isotherm functions enhance field measurement accuracy and ease.
paragraph_3: The camera package includes a rechargeable battery for extended use, along with essential accessories such as USB and Wi-Fi cables for fast data transfer. The included items ensure that users have all they need to start using the camera effectively right out of the box.
Rechargeable Battery: Ensures long-lasting power for extended use.

Camera Warranty: 2 years, with an extended 10-year warranty on the detector if registered on the FLIR website. Unregistered products come with a 1-year warranty. For detailed warranty conditions and registration, visit FLIR's website.

subCats.name: FLIR C5 Pocket Size - Entry Level
subCats.title: Compact and Powerful Thermal Imaging Camera
subCats.description: The FLIR C5, with a 160 × 120 (19,200 pixel) true thermal resolution, MSX® (Multi-Spectral Dynamic Imaging) technology, 5-megapixel camera, and LED flashlight, makes it easy to identify issues that are not visible to the naked eye. The C5 allows you to quickly upload your images to the FLIR Ignite™ app for easy backup and instantly share these images with clients to report issues effectively.
paragraph_1: Description: MSX technology and 160 × 120 true thermal resolution help you quickly find hidden faults and reduce diagnostic time.
Description: Use the FLIR Ignite™ connection to directly upload images, then create professional reports and easily send them to clients via email.
Description: The C5 is designed to be durable with IP54-rated protection against water and dust and can withstand drops from up to 2 meters. Its compact design makes it portable for any job.
paragraph_2: Accuracy: At ambient temperature of 15 to 35 °C and object temperature above 0 °C (32 °F), 0 to 100 °C (32 to 212 °F): ± 3 °C (± 5.5 °F), 100 to 400 °C (212 to 752 °F): ± 3%

subCats.title: MSX® Thermal Imaging: A New Dimension
subCats.description: The FLIR ONE Edge Pro features FLIR's unique MSX® technology, which adds real-time critical details from the visible light camera to all infrared images. This allows you to detect irregular heat patterns alongside thermal images, providing instant results on the LCD screen.
paragraph_1: While identifying inaccessible or hidden areas, you can view the images on your mobile device or easily attach the FLIR ONE® Edge Pro to your smart device for one-handed control.
With FLIR MSX, VividIR, and a 160 × 120 (19,200 pixels) thermal resolution, you can capture high-quality thermal images, easily identify targets, and pinpoint where problems are located.
The FLIR ONE Edge Pro is always ready with a 2.5-hour battery life and fast charging capability. It is IP54 rated and has passed a 2-meter drop test, ensuring durability and reliability.
Improve your business with accurate image analysis and reporting, helping your clients understand the problem and trust your services.

subItems.name: Vibration Sensors
subItems.title: Vibration Sensors: Essential Monitoring Tools for Machinery Health
subItems.description: Vibration sensors are essential tools for monitoring and analyzing machinery health. They detect and measure vibrations in mechanical systems, providing valuable data to prevent equipment failures and optimize performance. Available in various types and configurations, these sensors offer outputs in velocity, acceleration, or displacement units. They can integrate with PLC, DCS, and IIoT systems, and are often equipped with features like dual outputs for additional data, rugged designs for harsh environments, and options for explosive atmospheres (Ex Proof). Reliable and precise, vibration sensors help ensure the longevity and efficiency of industrial equipment.

subCats.name: 4-20 mA Vibration Sensors
subCats.title: 4-20mA Total Value Sensors
subCats.description: 4-20 mA total value sensors are designed to convert measured vibrations into total value output in velocity and/or acceleration units, allowing direct connection to PLC/DCS/IIoT systems. Ex Proof sensor options are also available for explosive environments.
paragraph_1: HS-420: 4-20 mA Velocity
HS-421: 4-20 mA Velocity and AC Acceleration
HS-422: 4-20 mA Acceleration
HS-423: 4-20 mA Acceleration and AC Acceleration
paragraph_2: Magnets: Flat and dual-foot magnets for secure sensor placement.
Adhesive Pads: For stable mounting on various surfaces.
Screws: For fixed installation on machinery.
Electrically Insulated Mounts: To prevent electrical interference.
Thermal Dampers: To minimize the impact of temperature fluctuations.
Motor Blade Adapters: Custom mounts for specific applications.
paragraph_3: Custom Cables: Tailored solutions with various connector types and cable specifications.
Portable Analyzer Cables: Specific cables for portable analyzers available upon request.

subCats.name: 100 mV/g AC Sensors
subCats.title: 100 mV/g AC Sensors
subCats.description: AC output accelerometers can be produced to meet a wide range of demands. Sensors can be tailored according to connector type, connector orientation, sensor dimensions, sensitivity values, IP protection class, cable specifications, and mounting options. Single-axis or multi-axis sensors are available, and for more details on cables and other components, please refer to the brochure or contact us. ATEX certified sensors for explosive environments are also available for all options.
subCats.head_2: AC Premium - HS-150 and HS-170 Series
subCats.paragraph_1: HS-100 series sensors are piezoelectric vibration sensors with AC output in acceleration units, designed for online or portable vibration measurement systems. They come with various sensitivity values, connector types and orientations, mounting options, and protection classes. Maximum operating temperature is 150°C. The HS-105 series can be used up to 250°C.
subCats.paragraph_2: The Premium series accelerometers are made with advanced shear mode technology, offering more stable results and faster adjustment times compared to the HS-100 series. They can be customized with various sensitivity values, connector types and orientations, mounting options, and protection classes. Maximum operating temperature is 150°C, with the HS-170 series available in smaller sizes for restricted spaces. Details can be found in the brochure.
subCats.paragraph_3: The HS-172 and HS-173 series premium sensors allow for simultaneous vibration measurements from two or three channels. Suitable for both portable and online systems, with a maximum temperature of 130°C. Further details can be found in the brochure.
subCats.paragraph_4: Proper installation of sensors and analyzers is crucial for accurate vibration measurements. We offer various solutions including flat and dual-foot magnets, adhesive pads, screws, electrically isolated mounts, thermal dampers, and mounts for motor blades. Please refer to the brochure for more details.
subCats.paragraph_5: We provide a range of cables tailored to your applications, with various connector types and cable specifications available. For portable analyzers or other cable needs, please contact us.

service.name: RDI MOTION AMPLIFICATION
service.title: RDI Motion Amplification Service
service.header: Enhancing Industrial Maintenance with Precision Motion Analysis
service.description: At IMEC, we are committed to providing cutting-edge solutions for industrial maintenance and reliability. Our RDI Motion Amplification Service is a revolutionary technology that amplifies tiny movements to help you identify and diagnose machinery issues with unprecedented clarity and accuracy.

subCats.name: IRIS M
subCats.title: Iris M: Revolutionizing Motion Detection with Advanced RDI Technology
subCats.description: The Iris M platform, developed by RDI Technologies, uncovers movements invisible to the naked eye through its cutting-edge motion amplification software. This revolutionary technology converts subtle vibrations into visible motion, enhancing operational efficiency, reliability, and quality monitoring. By transforming every pixel of the camera into a sensor, Iris M delivers millions of measurements per second without any physical connection, providing real-time insights for improved decision-making.
subCats.paragraph_1: Iris M offers the groundbreaking capability to visualize even the most subtle movements in real-time using Live Motion Amplification® technology. This feature enables users to monitor and analyze vibrations across various regions simultaneously, making it possible to identify issues with unparalleled precision. The platform also supports advanced data export options and frequency filtering, ensuring comprehensive analysis and stabilization for accurate results. With Iris M, both technical and non-technical personnel can communicate more effectively, leading to faster and more informed decisions, ultimately saving time and money.

subCats.name: IRIS MX
subCats.title: Iris MX: Expanding Motion Amplification® to High-Speed Applications
subCats.description: RDI Technologies introduces Iris MX, an extension of the revolutionary Iris M™ platform, bringing Motion Amplification® to high-speed applications. Capable of capturing up to 1400 FPS in HD resolution and utilizing frame rates over 10,000 FPS, Iris MX visualizes movements exceeding 5,000 Hz, allowing users to diagnose machines quickly and thoroughly. This advanced technology provides unparalleled insights by converting complex vibrations into easy-to-understand videos, bridging communication gaps between technical and non-technical personnel.
subCats.paragraph_1: Iris MX sets a new standard in high-speed motion visualization by enabling Motion Amplification® at extraordinary frame rates. This allows users to see every subtle movement within a scene and produce infinite absolute measurements, all in real-time. The ability to visualize the entire machine, structure, and surroundings helps in identifying root causes quickly. Iris MX simplifies complex diagnostics into clear, actionable video content, empowering teams to make informed decisions and resolve issues efficiently.

subCats.name: RDI IRIS M™ TRAVELER
subCats.title: Iris M™ Traveler: Portable Vibration Analysis with Motion Amplification®
subCats.description: Experience the power of Motion Amplification® on the go with the Iris M™ Traveler. This portable, compact, and lightweight vibration analysis system is designed to move with you, capturing millions of data points quickly in challenging environments. With minimal setup time, you can easily gather critical data in tight spaces and logistically difficult areas, enhancing the capacity and reach of your reliability program.
subCats.paragraph_1: The Iris M™ Traveler uses Motion Amplification® to make invisible displacements visible, turning every pixel into a sensor capable of detecting minute movements. This system not only visualizes but also quantifies mechanical or structural behaviors with the precision of a contact displacement sensor, ensuring you can capture critical data with accuracy and ease.
subCats.paragraph_2: With its ability to filter data and visualize motion at specific frequencies, the Iris M™ Traveler helps you quickly identify and diagnose the root causes of mechanical issues. The clear, amplified videos produced by the system bridge the communication gap between technical and non-technical team members, making problem-solving more efficient and collaborative.

subCats.name: Iris CM
subCats.title: Iris CM: Continuous Equipment Monitoring with Motion Amplification®
subCats.description: Iris CM is the most innovative technology designed for monitoring the condition of your equipment or machinery. With Iris CM, Motion Amplification® becomes a flexible and scalable solution that continuously monitors your equipment even when you're away. This tool ensures you don’t miss anything in your facility by combining traditional vibration inputs with RDI's patented video-based vibration measurements.
subCats.paragraph_1: Iris CM allows for real-time, continuous monitoring of your equipment, connecting to a network of cameras to capture synchronized data from multiple views of a process, test, or machine part. With its ability to interface with accelerometers, tachometers, and any 4-20 mA inputs, Iris CM records and stores HD data from each connected camera, alongside external sensor data. Users can trigger video and data recordings based on external inputs, virtual camera-based points of interest, and motion thresholds, enabling precise quantification of vibration, amplitude, phase, and frequency for any visible event in both live Motion Amplification® and recorded footage.

content.what_is_it: Motion Amplification is a video-based technology that detects and visualizes subtle movements that are not visible to the naked eye. By amplifying these movements, our system converts them into easy-to-understand visual data, allowing for precise identification of issues in machinery and structures.
features: High-Definition Video Analysis: Captures high-resolution video of your machinery in action, ensuring every detail is recorded.
Non-Invasive Technique: Requires no physical contact with your equipment, minimizing downtime and disruption.
Comprehensive Diagnostics: Identifies issues such as misalignment, imbalance, looseness, and structural defects.
Real-Time Reporting: Provides immediate feedback and detailed reports, facilitating quick decision-making.
benefits: Increased Reliability: Early detection of potential issues prevents unexpected failures and extends machinery life.
Cost Savings: Reduces the need for frequent manual inspections and costly unplanned downtime.
Enhanced Safety: Identifies and mitigates risks before they become critical, ensuring a safer working environment.
Optimized Performance: Ensures machinery operates at peak efficiency, improving overall productivity.
applications: Rotating Equipment: Pumps, motors, fans, and compressors.
Structural Components: Beams, foundations, and piping.
Mechanical Systems: Conveyors, gearboxes, and couplings.
content.why_choose_imec: IMEC combines advanced technology with expert knowledge to deliver unparalleled motion amplification services. Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to helping you achieve optimal machinery performance and reliability.

service.name: PERIODIC STATUS MONITORING
service.title: Periodic Status Monitoring Service
service.header: Maintaining Optimal Performance with Regular Monitoring
service.description: At IMEC, we offer comprehensive Periodic Status Monitoring to ensure the continuous health and efficiency of your machinery and systems. Our service involves regular checks and evaluations to help you proactively manage maintenance and avoid unexpected disruptions.

subCats.name: Vibration Analysis
subCats.title: Comprehensive Vibration Analysis for Predictive Maintenance
subCats.description: Vibration analysis, also known as vibration diagnostics, is a widely-used and effective method for detecting various faults in rotating equipment such as motors, pumps, fans, gearboxes, turbines, and more. By identifying issues like imbalance, misalignment, bearing faults, and resonance, vibration analysis helps prevent unexpected downtime and extend equipment life.
subCats.paragraph_1: Vibration analysis enables the early detection of potential issues, often months before they lead to unexpected failures. This proactive approach reduces maintenance costs, minimizes unplanned downtime, and enhances the reliability of your production and facilities. By integrating vibration analysis into your maintenance strategy, you can ensure smoother operations and lower overall expenses.
subCats.paragraph_2: Vibration analysis can identify a range of faults including imbalance, misalignment, structural and connection issues, soft foot, coupling problems, out-of-tolerance bearing clearance, bearing damage, lubrication issues, gear damage, motor rotor and stator problems, VFD drive faults, belt problems, and resonance. Addressing these issues early ensures that your equipment continues to operate at peak efficiency.
subCats.paragraph_3: We offer periodic vibration measurement, reporting, and consulting services to maintain the reliability of your equipment. Our services include database creation, scheduled vibration measurements, professional reporting, and supervisory support for corrective actions. By monitoring your equipment regularly, you can make informed decisions to prevent failures and optimize performance.
subCats.paragraph_4: No matter the brand of your vibration measurement device, we provide analysis and reporting services based on the data you collect. Our services include database management, ensuring accurate measurements, and optimizing measurement intervals. Additionally, we offer customized reports that allow your technicians to test and enhance their analysis skills, leading to improved diagnostics and maintenance practices.
subCats.paragraph_5: Regardless of the brand of your online condition monitoring system, we can connect to your system and provide periodic vibration data reports for your equipment. We guarantee feedback within 24 hours for any warning or alarm conditions, ensuring that you stay informed and can take immediate action to address potential issues.

subCats.name: Thermography
subCats.title: The Advantages of Thermography in Early Fault Detection
subCats.description: Thermography is a powerful, non-invasive technique that detects temperature variations and thermal performance issues before they lead to significant damage. By identifying electrical and mechanical problems at an early stage, thermography helps improve safety, prevent costly downtime, and extend the life of your equipment. With its ability to quickly and accurately assess large areas, thermography provides a cost-effective solution for maintaining the reliability and efficiency of your operations.
subCats.head_1: Ensuring Safety and Efficiency with Thermography
subCats.paragraph_1: In almost every failure mechanism, a rise in temperature occurs before significant and catastrophic damage. Thermography is the safest and most cost-effective method for analyzing thermal performance and temperature differences. By detecting electrical connection issues or mechanical problems early, thermography can enhance workplace safety and prevent costly downtime, production losses, fires, and disasters.
subCats.paragraph_2: Thermography provides non-contact measurement, allowing for the detection of temperature anomalies quickly, reliably, and accurately. Large areas can be analyzed swiftly, making it a low-cost method that delivers clear and understandable results.
subCats.paragraph_3: Thermography can identify issues such as bearing and coupling failures, misalignment problems, heat exchanger faults, insulation issues, and fluid leak detection, ensuring the reliability of your equipment.

subCats.name: Ultrasonic Tester
subCats.title: Ultrasonic Testing for Early Fault Detection and Energy Efficiency
subCats.description: Ultrasonic testing is a cutting-edge, non-invasive technique used to detect early-stage mechanical and electrical faults and identify energy-wasting air and gas leaks. With rapid and accurate results, this method enhances predictive maintenance by identifying issues such as bearing damage, valve problems, and electrical faults, ensuring your equipment's reliability and efficiency.
subCats.head_1: Ultrasonic Testing for Early Fault Detection
subCats.paragraph_1: Ultrasonic testing is a powerful method for detecting early-stage faults in various mechanical and electrical systems, while also identifying air and gas leaks that can significantly impact energy efficiency. This non-invasive technique is widely used in industry, particularly for identifying pressurized air leaks. The fast and reliable results provided by ultrasonic testing allow for energy efficiency improvements to be swiftly implemented.
subCats.paragraph_2: Ultrasonic testing offers numerous advantages, including non-contact measurement, the ability to quantify energy losses, rapid and accurate results, and the capacity to analyze large areas quickly. It is also a cost-effective and easily understood method for predictive maintenance.
subCats.paragraph_3: Ultrasonic testing can identify a wide range of issues such as bearing and coupling failures, pressurized air and gas leaks, valve problems, cavitation, electrical issues like arcing or corona, transformer faults, gear damage, lubrication issues, precision lubrication needs, and bearing damage in low-speed equipment.
subCats.paragraph_4: We offer various service models to ensure the reliability of your equipment. These include detecting and reporting pressurized air and gas leaks, identifying steam trap damage, performing electrical tests on low, medium, and high-voltage systems, and conducting mechanical tests to find issues with bearings, hydraulic units, lubrication, coupling damage, and more.

content.what_is_it: Periodic Status Monitoring is a systematic approach to regularly assess the condition of your equipment and infrastructure. By conducting scheduled inspections and evaluations, we provide insights into the performance and reliability of your systems, enabling timely interventions and maintenance actions.
features: Scheduled Inspections: Regularly scheduled visits to monitor and assess the condition of your equipment.
Detailed Reporting: Comprehensive reports on the current status and performance of your machinery.
Predictive Analysis: Utilizes historical data and trends to predict potential issues before they arise.

benefits: Proactive Maintenance: Identifies potential issues early, reducing the risk of unexpected failures and costly repairs.

Cost Efficiency: Minimizes emergency repairs and unplanned downtime, leading to significant cost savings.
Improved Performance: Ensures equipment operates at peak performance, contributing to higher overall productivity.
applications: Manufacturing Equipment: Machines and production lines.
Building Systems: HVAC systems, electrical panels, and plumbing.
Industrial Infrastructure: Pipelines, tanks, and support structures.
content.why_choose_imec: IMEC's Periodic Status Monitoring combines expert knowledge with advanced tools to provide reliable and effective monitoring services. Our experienced team is dedicated to helping you maintain optimal performance and reliability of your equipment through proactive and systematic assessments.

service.name: ADVANCES SERVICES
service.title: IMEC Advanced Services
service.header: Innovative Solutions for Complex Maintenance Challenges
service.description: At IMEC, our Advanced Services are designed to tackle the most complex and demanding maintenance challenges with cutting-edge technologies and expert insights. We provide specialized solutions that go beyond traditional methods to ensure optimal performance and reliability for your systems and equipment.

subCats.name: Torque
subCats.title: Comprehensive Torque Measurement Services for Enhanced Equipment Performance
subCats.description: Accurate torque measurements are essential for diagnosing shaft failure modes, understanding driver control unit characteristics, and assessing loading conditions on bearings, gears, spindles, and couplings. While motor current-based torque calculations provide useful data under stable conditions, they may fall short in capturing torsional dynamics under variable conditions. Our torque testing services offer precise measurements of torque values and fluctuations during motor acceleration, process changes, and intermittent events, combined with synchronous measurements from accelerometers, tachometers, displacement sensors, and process data. Contact us for advanced telemetric torque measurement services tailored to your critical equipment.
subCats.head_1: Torque Measurement Services for Marine Engines
subCats.head_4: Dynamic Load Detection in Cranes and Pumps
subCats.paragraph_1: Our services include determining the real power transmitted from ship engines to shafts, measuring torsional vibrations, and evaluating performance and efficiency in gearboxes. We offer comprehensive assessments to ensure your marine machinery operates optimally, identifying any issues that could affect performance and reliability.
subCats.paragraph_2: For factory production machinery, we provide precise measurements of effective speed and maximum power. Post-maintenance performance evaluations are also conducted to verify that machines are operating as expected, ensuring continued efficiency and reliability in your production processes.
subCats.paragraph_3: We measure the power produced by wind turbines and hydroelectric plants, offering insights into energy generation and system performance. Our services ensure that power output is accurately assessed, supporting optimal operation and maintenance of renewable energy systems.
subCats.paragraph_4: Our services include detecting dynamic loads in crane and winch operations and assessing power requirements for large pump groups. By accurately measuring these dynamic loads and power needs, we help optimize the performance and reliability of your heavy-duty equipment.

subCats.name: Geometric Alignment
subCats.title: Advanced Geometric Measurements for Precision and Reliability
subCats.description: To meet the increasing demands of modern industry, machines are operating at faster speeds and tighter tolerances. RI-SE provides advanced geometric measurement services to enhance the reliability and precision of your equipment. Our services include flatness, straightness, location accuracy, parallelism, and alignment of holes and bearings, ensuring superior performance and reliability.
subCats.paragraph_1: Flatness measurements are crucial for ensuring the accuracy and stability of various components. We assess the flatness of machine bases, circular and square flanges (such as those used in cranes, wind turbines, and vertical turbine outlet pipes), tool machine tables, and main machine chassis. By using advanced techniques, we deliver faster, more reliable, and reportable results compared to traditional methods like piano wires and spirit levels.
subCats.paragraph_2: Straightness measurements are essential for maintaining precision in long components and systems. Our services include evaluating the straightness of paper and cardboard machines, rails, CNC floors, and long machine bodies. We also assess the straightness of bearing and shaft supports and identify surface wear and deflections in long planes, ensuring optimal performance and alignment.
subCats.paragraph_3: Ensuring parallelism is critical for machinery and structural integrity. We measure the parallelism of crane rails, wind turbine flange connections, paper machine rollers, press surfaces, and any two machines that require precise alignment. Our advanced measurement techniques help in maintaining the accurate alignment and functioning of these critical components.
subCats.paragraph_4: Proper alignment of bearings is essential for smooth operation and longevity of machinery. We specialize in measuring gas, steam, and hydraulic turbines, aligning bearings, and considering thermal expansion and deflection in our assessments. Our services ensure that bearings are precisely aligned, preventing potential issues and optimizing machinery performance.
subCats.paragraph_5: Following installation, we offer periodic service options to monitor the condition of your equipment, prevent potential failures, and optimize maintenance activities. Your historical reports and data are securely stored on our reliable servers and can be shared upon request, providing you with valuable insights for ongoing equipment management.

subCats.name: Remote and Long-Term Monitoring
subCats.title: Long-Term Equipment Monitoring with Multi-Channel Analyzers
subCats.description: RI-SE offers advanced long-term monitoring services using multi-channel analyzers combined with vibration, displacement, tachometer, torque sensors, and control system data. This comprehensive approach allows for the detection of vibration events that occur at random times and are dependent on the process, which are not easily captured with standard measurements.
subCats.paragraph_1: Machines can exhibit different vibration patterns under varying operational conditions such as load and speed. Continuous and long-term measurements are crucial for understanding these patterns. RI-SE’s monitoring system captures data over extended periods and correlates it with process parameters, providing insights into how different conditions affect machine performance.
subCats.paragraph_2: Machines can exhibit different vibration patterns under varying operational conditions such as load and speed. Continuous and long-term measurements are crucial for understanding these patterns. RI-SE’s monitoring system captures data over extended periods and correlates it with process parameters, providing insights into how different conditions affect machine performance.
subCats.paragraph_3: Measured data is transmitted in real-time to the 'RI-SE Condition Monitoring Center' via GPRS. Our engineers continuously monitor the condition of your equipment, enabling them to report and address any issues as they arise. This proactive approach ensures that potential problems are detected and resolved quickly, minimizing downtime and improving overall operational efficiency.

subCats.name: Modal Test ve ODS
subCats.title: Advanced Diagnostics with Operating Deflection Shape (ODS) and Modal Testing
subCats.description: For complex and dynamic problems, the most effective diagnostic tools are Operating Deflection Shape (ODS) and Modal Testing techniques. These methods provide in-depth analysis of structural deformations, resonance conditions, and natural frequencies, offering a comprehensive understanding of equipment behavior under real-world conditions.
subCats.head_1: ODS Analysis for Structural Deformation Visualization
subCats.head_2: Modal Testing for Resonance and Natural Frequency Detection
subCats.head_3: Expert Services for ODS and Modal Testing
subCats.paragraph_1: ODS analysis allows for the visualization of structural deformations as animations under specific frequencies. It is particularly effective in identifying forced vibrations, such as imbalance, misalignment, and resonance conditions, providing a clear picture of how these factors influence the overall structure. By capturing these dynamics, ODS analysis offers a powerful tool for diagnosing and addressing equipment issues.
subCats.paragraph_2: Modal Testing, while similar to ODS, focuses on identifying resonance conditions and natural frequencies. This method involves applying measurable forces to structures or machinery and recording frequency responses using accelerometers at multiple points. The collected data is then used to determine modal parameters such as natural frequencies, damping ratios, stiffness coefficients, and mode shapes, offering critical insights into how to manage equipment operating under resonant conditions.
subCats.paragraph_3: RI-SE provides expert ODS and Modal Testing services using state-of-the-art equipment and software. Our skilled engineers specialize in diagnosing and solving complex vibration issues, helping to ensure the reliability and efficiency of your machinery. Whether you're facing structural challenges or need to optimize equipment performance, our team is equipped to deliver precise and actionable results.

service.name: SPECIAL SERVICES FOR FACILITIES
service.title: IMEC Special Services for Facilities
service.header: Tailored Solutions for Facility Maintenance and Management
service.description: At IMEC, our Special Services for Facilities provide customized maintenance solutions designed to meet the unique needs of various facilities. We offer a range of specialized services to ensure your facility operates smoothly, efficiently, and safely.

subCats.name: Hydroelectric Power Plants
subCats.title: Advanced Diagnostic and Corrective Services for Hydroelectric Turbines
subCats.description: Hydroelectric turbines are complex systems where mechanical, electrical, and hydraulic issues can occur simultaneously. RI-SE offers advanced diagnostic services for Francis, Kaplan, and Pelton turbines, whether in vertical or horizontal configurations. Our expert engineers use cutting-edge methods such as spectrum and orbit analysis, in-situ balancing, and laser alignment to detect and correct abnormalities. All vibration data is compared with the latest standards, ISO 20816-5 and 13373-7, ensuring your equipment's condition is benchmarked against industry best practices.
subCats.paragraph_1: Our diagnostic services include filtered and unfiltered orbit graphics, shaft displacement measurements with displacement sensors, and absolute bearing vibration assessments using accelerometers. These methods enable precise identification of issues like shaft misalignment, unbalance, and bearing damage, ensuring your turbines operate at peak efficiency.
subCats.paragraph_2: We specialize in detecting hydraulic stresses such as cavitation and vortex rope formation, which can cause significant damage in vertical Francis turbines. By correlating load and vibration data, we can pinpoint these issues and provide actionable insights. Additionally, our services include torque and axial thrust measurements for a thorough evaluation of your turbine's mechanical health.
subCats.paragraph_3: Should our diagnostics reveal the need, we offer on-site balancing and shaft alignment services. By addressing mechanical problems like misalignment and imbalance, we help you prevent costly downtimes and extend the lifespan of your equipment. Our reports provide detailed analysis and recommendations, supporting your journey toward operational excellence.

subCats.name: Wind Turbines
subCats.title: Advanced Diagnostic and Alignment Services for Wind Turbines
subCats.description: Wind turbines are complex systems where mechanical, electrical, and aerodynamic issues can intersect, requiring specialized expertise. RI-SE offers advanced diagnostic services for all sizes and brands of wind turbines, including vibration and torque analysis, and precision shaft alignment. Our expert engineers employ specialized techniques to diagnose issues such as low-speed bearing damage, gear anomalies, nacelle oscillations, and generator faults. All measurements are benchmarked against ISO 10816-21 standards, ensuring your turbines operate reliably and efficiently.
subCats.paragraph_1: Wind turbines pose unique challenges, particularly with low-speed bearings and complex gear systems like planetary and helical gears. Our specialized vibration analysis techniques, including Time Synchronous Averaging and low-speed bearing fault detection, provide a detailed assessment of your turbine’s mechanical health. Additionally, torque and axial thrust measurements offer insights into the operational stresses affecting your system.
subCats.paragraph_2: Misaligned shafts and unbalanced rotors can lead to significant mechanical wear and tear. RI-SE provides on-site balancing and precision shaft alignment services to correct these issues, ensuring your wind turbines operate smoothly and efficiently. By addressing mechanical misalignments and imbalances, we help prevent costly downtimes and extend the lifespan of your equipment.
subCats.paragraph_3: Our diagnostics extend beyond traditional methods, incorporating nacelle oscillation measurements and load-vibration correlation matrices to identify and mitigate resonant conditions. These advanced techniques allow us to diagnose and correct complex problems, such as flow issues, gear wear, and generator faults, with high precision.
subCats.paragraph_4: All diagnostic results are thoroughly analyzed and compared with the ISO 10816-21 standard, providing you with detailed reports that benchmark your turbine’s condition against industry standards. These reports not only identify current issues but also offer recommendations for preventive measures, ensuring your turbines remain in optimal operating condition.

subCats.name: Spindle and Grinding Machines
subCats.title: Predictive Maintenance for Spindles and Grinding Machines
subCats.description: Spindles and grinding machines require specialized predictive maintenance due to their complex internal structures and high operating speeds. RI-SE offers expert predictive maintenance services tailored to these critical machines, utilizing advanced measurement systems and the expertise of experienced engineers. Our services ensure early detection and resolution of issues such as unbalance, bearing damage, and vibration problems, helping to maintain optimal performance and prevent costly downtimes.
subCats.paragraph_1: Spindles and grinding machines differ significantly from conventional industrial equipment, necessitating a unique approach to predictive maintenance. Our specialized services focus on identifying and resolving key issues like unbalance, coupling problems, and lubrication failures. By addressing these problems early, we help you avoid production defects caused by chatter and other mechanical issues.
subCats.paragraph_2: Our diagnostics cover a wide range of potential faults, including vibration analysis, bearing damage detection, and belt-pulley alignment issues. Additionally, we provide solutions for electrical problems in external motors. With RI-SE's predictive maintenance, your spindles and grinding machines can operate at peak efficiency, minimizing the risk of unexpected failures.

service.title: IMEC Precision Maintenance Services
service.header: Achieving Excellence with Expert Maintenance Solutions
service.description: IMEC's Precision Maintenance Services provide advanced maintenance solutions focused on achieving high levels of accuracy and efficiency. Our services are designed to ensure that your equipment and systems operate at peak performance with minimal downtime and optimal reliability.

subCats.name: Dynamic In-Situ Balancing
subCats.title: On-Site Precision Balancing Services
subCats.description: Ensure the reliability and longevity of your rotating equipment with RI-SE's expert on-site balancing services. By minimizing the impact on production, our certified engineers perform precise balancing at the equipment's nominal speed without the need for disassembly, reducing downtime and improving performance.
subCats.paragraph_1: On-site balancing eliminates the need for costly disassembly and reassembly, allowing for adjustments at the equipment's nominal speed. This process ensures minimal production loss, provides easy comparison of pre- and post-balancing conditions, and offers a cost-effective solution with precise corrective measures.
subCats.paragraph_2: Our on-site balancing services are ideal for a wide range of equipment, including electric motors, diesel engines, hydroelectric turbines, industrial fans, steam turbines, generators, pumps, couplings, pulleys, and gearboxes. By addressing imbalance issues directly on-site, we help extend the life of your equipment and enhance its operational efficiency.

subCats.name: Shaft Alignment Service
subCats.title: Precision Shaft Alignment Services
subCats.description: Misalignment in shafts is one of the leading causes of increased forces on components like bearings, shafts, and seals, which can lead to reduced equipment reliability. RI-SE offers precise shaft alignment services using state-of-the-art technology and certified engineers to ensure your rotating equipment operates efficiently and with minimal risk of failure.
subCats.paragraph_1: Laser shaft alignment reduces energy consumption, mechanical and thermal loads, and equipment vibration and temperature. It ensures precise alignment that is independent of operator skill, reducing the risk of shaft cracks and fractures, while enhancing rotor stability and extending bearing life by minimizing axial and radial loads.
subCats.paragraph_2: Laser shaft alignment can be applied to all rotating equipment with coupling connections, such as motor-pump systems, motor-fan assemblies, turbomachinery, and gearboxes. It also accommodates various alignment challenges, including thermal expansion, sliding bearings, and flexible couplings.
subCats.paragraph_3: We provide precise alignment services for steam and gas turbines, ensuring optimal performance and reliability. Our services cover both horizontal and vertical configurations, adapting to the specific needs of your equipment.
subCats.paragraph_4: Our engineers specialize in aligning the generator, gearbox, and main bearings of wind turbines, ensuring that these critical components operate in harmony to maximize efficiency and minimize downtime.
subCats.paragraph_5: We offer alignment services for hydroelectric turbines, including Pelton, Francis, and Kaplan types in both horizontal and vertical configurations. Our precise alignment techniques help maintain the integrity and performance of your turbines, supporting reliable and efficient power generation.

subCats.name: Acceptance Tests
subCats.title: Comprehensive Equipment Condition Testing and Expert Reporting Services
subCats.description: Ensure the reliability and performance of newly installed machinery or equipment before delivering to your customers with our comprehensive condition testing and expert reporting services. Our certified engineers conduct detailed evaluations and provide impartial reports, helping you make informed decisions regarding equipment acceptance or rejection.
subCats.paragraph_1: Our certified and highly specialized engineers at RI-SE conduct thorough evaluations and measurements of equipment purchased or maintained for your facility. These evaluations can be performed on-site or at the manufacturer’s or maintenance workshop. During the reporting process, the manufacturer's specified limits, standards, or guidelines are used to assess the equipment's condition. Based on the report, you can make informed decisions regarding the acceptance or rejection of the equipment. RI-SE operates as an independent entity, ensuring that the results are evaluated and reported with integrity and ethical standards.
subCats.paragraph_2: RI-SE offers detailed assessments and reporting services for the equipment you manufacture or maintain. Our certified and highly specialized engineers conduct these evaluations on-site at your production facility or the installation site. The process involves using your specified limits, standards, or guidelines to assess the condition of the equipment. The resulting report provides critical information that can influence the acceptance or rejection of the equipment. As an independent organization, RI-SE guarantees that the results are objectively evaluated and reported with the highest ethical standards.
subCats.paragraph_3: This service involves detailed condition testing of new or maintained machinery by RI-SE's certified engineers. It provides manufacturers and facility operators with a comprehensive report on the equipment’s condition, ensuring it meets all necessary standards and guidelines.

service.name: MLT Group Conveyor Belt Splicing
service.title: Innovative Conveyor Belt Splicing Solutions by MLT Group
service.description: MLT Group specializes in the manufacture of cutting-edge splicing solutions for conveyor belts. Since 1947, MLT has leveraged its extensive expertise to offer a comprehensive range of rubber belt solutions. The company is renowned for its invention of the SUPER-SCREW®* flexible screw splice, a groundbreaking advancement in belt splicing technology.

subCats.name: SUPER‑SCREW®* 2024
subCats.title: SUPER‑SCREW®* 2024: The Next Evolution in Conveyor Belt Splicing
subCats.description: SUPER‑SCREW®* 2024 represents a groundbreaking advancement in conveyor belt splicing with its innovative mechanical vulcanization technology. This latest version integrates screws and washers into the belt in a way that makes them invisible on the surface, eliminating wear and interference. MLT Group’s 2024 iteration offers a seamless, durable splice that enhances belt performance and longevity.
subCats.head_1: Revolutionizing Conveyor Belt Splicing with SUPER‑SCREW®* 2024
subCats.paragraph_1: The SUPER‑SCREW®* 2024 is a significant leap forward in conveyor belt splicing technology, featuring mechanical vulcanization that merges screws and washers into the belt, making them virtually invisible. This innovation eliminates traditional wear and interference issues, creating a splice that feels like a natural extension of the belt. Compatible with scrapers and adaptable to various belt thicknesses, it offers exceptional wear and impact resistance for superior durability. With the 2024 model, MLT Group is not just enhancing splicing technology but redefining it, setting new standards for strength and resilience in the industry.

subCats.name: SUPER‑SCREW®* Premium
subCats.title: SUPER‑SCREW®* Premium: The Ultimate Solution for Heavy-Duty Belt Splicing
subCats.description: SUPER‑SCREW®* Premium is the first flexible screw splice made from polyurethane, engineered to excel in the most abrasive and demanding environments. This innovative splice offers enhanced abrasion resistance while maintaining the flexibility and strength that SUPER‑SCREW®* is known for.
subCats.paragraph_1: Designed specifically for the harshest conditions, the SUPER‑SCREW®* Premium sets a new standard in belt splicing. The polyurethane material used in the upper part of this splice delivers exceptional abrasion resistance (15 mm³), addressing the needs of highly abrasive applications without compromising flexibility or strength. This makes the SUPER‑SCREW®* Premium an ideal choice for environments where durability and performance are critical. MLT Group’s commitment to innovation ensures that this splice integrates seamlessly with your belt system, offering a robust and reliable solution for heavy-duty applications.

subCats.name: SUPER‑SCREW®* Security
subCats.title: SUPER‑SCREW®* Security: The First Belt Splice with a Safety Indicator
subCats.description: SUPER‑SCREW®* Security introduces the world's first splice equipped with a safety indicator, designed to enhance maintenance efficiency and minimize conveyor downtime. This innovative splice allows for predictive maintenance, offering a substantial reduction in operational interruptions.
subCats.paragraph_1: The SUPER‑SCREW®* Security splice represents a significant advancement in belt splicing technology. By incorporating a safety indicator, this splice enables you to monitor the condition of the splice and predict when it needs to be replaced. This proactive approach not only helps in optimizing maintenance schedules but also significantly reduces unexpected downtime, ensuring smoother and more reliable conveyor operations. MLT Group's innovative design brings a new level of convenience and efficiency to conveyor maintenance, setting a new benchmark in the industry.

subCats.name: SUPER‑SCREW®* Evolution
subCats.title: SUPER‑SCREW®* Evolution: The Next Generation of Splices
subCats.description: SUPER‑SCREW®* Evolution represents the latest advancement in flexible screw splicing technology, offering enhanced flexibility and resistance compared to its predecessor. MLT’s R&D teams have pushed the boundaries of innovation to deliver this next-generation solution for heavy-duty belts.
subCats.head_1: Experience the Next Generation with SUPER‑SCREW®* Evolution
subCats.paragraph_1: The SUPER‑SCREW®* Evolution is a groundbreaking development in belt splicing, designed to exceed the capabilities of the original SUPER-SCREW®. With its improved flexibility and durability, this new generation of splices provides superior performance in heavy-duty applications. MLT's commitment to innovation ensures that the SUPER‑SCREW® Evolution delivers exceptional reliability and adaptability, making it the ideal choice for demanding environments. This advanced splice solution not only enhances operational efficiency but also extends the lifespan of your conveyor belts.

subCats.name: SUPER‑SCREW®* Original
subCats.title: SUPER‑SCREW®* Original: The Historical Product
subCats.description: The SUPER‑SCREW®* Original, introduced in 1994 by MLT, is the world’s first flexible screw splice. Renowned for its simplicity and effectiveness, this pioneering product has become a global standard for heavy-duty belt splicing, offering reliable and quick installation in various conditions.
subCats.head_1: Discover the Legacy of SUPER‑SCREW®* Original
subCats.paragraph_1: The SUPER‑SCREW®* Original represents a significant milestone in belt splicing technology, being the very first flexible screw splice developed by MLT. Since its introduction, it has set the benchmark for durability and ease of use, providing a permanent and seamless solution for heavy-duty belts. Its ability to be installed swiftly in diverse environments has made it a trusted choice worldwide, proving its long-standing value and effectiveness in the field.

subCats.name: ISC™
subCats.title: ISC™: Integrated Screw Connection for Heavy Duty Belts
subCats.description: The ISC™ (Integrated Screw Connection) represents a groundbreaking advancement in conveyor belt splicing. This innovative lacing solution creates an endless belt by seamlessly screwing its ends together, eliminating any additional thickness. Its efficient design allows for rapid installation in just 20 minutes.
subCats.head_1: The Next Generation of Belt Splicing
subCats.paragraph_1: The ISC™ stands out as a revolutionary solution in the conveyor belt fastener market. Unlike traditional methods, it integrates the screw connection directly into the belt, providing a smooth, uninterrupted splice without added bulk. This streamlined approach ensures quick and efficient installation, with the entire process completed in only 20 minutes, making it ideal for high-demand applications where time and efficiency are critical.

subCats.name: MS™ fastener
subCats.title: MS™ Fastener: Innovative Screw-On Solution for Heavy Duty Belts
subCats.description: The MS™ Fastener offers a cutting-edge approach to belt splicing by allowing belts to be joined through a simple screw-on mechanism. Designed and patented by MLT, this metal fastener is noted for its ease of installation, practicality, and cost-effectiveness, marking a significant advancement in the metal fastener market.
subCats.paragraph_1: The MS™ Fastener transforms the traditional approach to belt splicing with its innovative screw-on design. As a patented solution by MLT, it stands out for its simplicity and efficiency in installation. The fastener is not only economical and practical but also enhances safety by minimizing the risk associated with more complex splicing methods. This revolutionary fastener provides a reliable and swift solution for joining heavy-duty belts, setting a new standard in the industry.
